content.rendered:
Tuesday, January 14, 2025
Today is a “B” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Hey Maple Students! It is time to redeem your LiveSchool points! Look for an announcement in Canvas to visit our online shop on January 14th to place your order. The order form will close at the end of the day on Friday the 17th as we pack orders for delivery the following week. If you miss this opportunity, keep listening to the morning announcements for February’s online order dates and information! And keep following the 4 Bs to earn more points and make Maple Avenue a wonderful place to be.
  • French Club will meet on Wednesday, January 15 in room E142 after school. All students are welcome, even if you don’t take French.
  • No Place for Hate is meeting after school on Wednesday in room 257.
  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting tomorrow, January 15, in the Large Group Room after school. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass.
  • The Heritage Garden Club is offering two scholarships for Maple Ave. Middle School students in grades 6-7 to attend Camp Colby in the Adirondacks free for one week this summer! Camp Colby offers fun and adventure with hands-on science lessons, games, and outdoor exploration led by experienced counselors. For more details and how to apply, see your science teacher or Mr. Scrivo! Applications are due January 24.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
